summary.title: Summary
summary.content: With a passion for programming since my teenage years, I learned programming on my own and I have worked on multiple projects, both personally and professionally. I am a fast learner, conscientious, and I have strong attention to details. Even tought my bachellor's degree is in progress, I am looking to apply my experience gathered during the last few years on larger scale projects.
